summary: All four requirements are substantially implemented in the diff. REQ-1 adds encryptImage/decryptImage to cryptoNotes.ts; REQ-2 hides image count badge and thumbnails on NoteCard for encrypted notes; REQ-3 implements pre/post-decryption image hiding and display in NoteDetailModal; REQ-4 handles decrypted image editing and re-encryption in NoteFormModal. No significant missing requirements or hallucinated features were detected.
